div.p: This is the final part of chapter 2, continuing into the start of page 3.
This is the start of the text of chapter 3; a chapter beginning on page 3 and containing subsections of its own.
Below this point, the text is laid out into columns
Here the text divides into two columns, and this paragraph is in the first column.
This is another paragraph in the first column.
This paragraph belongs to the second column.
At this point the text goes back to being in a single column.
This is the start of section 1 of chapter 3, beginning on page 3.
